content.body: PromiseResolve has some uses of SameValue which I think could just be "is" https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/control-abstraction-objects.html#sec-promise-resolve

It has one use of SameValue, comparing _xConstructor_ (a language value, probably an Object) with _C_ (definitely an Object). Editorial-Conventions says to use SameValue when comparing objects or unknown language values.
content.formatted_body: It has one use of SameValue, comparing xConstructor (a language value, probably an Object) with C (definitely an Object). Editorial-Conventions says to use SameValue when comparing objects or unknown language values.
